title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.21 - Examination of the record after the hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.21 - Examination of the record after the hearing

State Regulations

The record of the hearing may be examined by the public
at the department's office of administrative hearings during normal business
hours. However, material which may identify any person as a recipient of public
assistance or care is confidential and can be disclosed only to a party, or a
party's representative, and may not be redisclosed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
